index.html:
<html><head><script src="//ej2.syncfusion.com/javascript/demos/diagram/scrolling/datasource.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.syncfusion.com/ej2/21.1.35/dist/ej2.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
    <link href="https://cdn.syncfusion.com/ej2/21.1.35/material.css" rel="stylesheet">

    <link href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.3.7/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet">

    <style>
            body{
                touch-action:none;
            }
        </style></head><body><div class="stackblitz-container {{theme}}"><div class="control-section">
    <link href="https://ej2.syncfusion.com/demos/src/diagram/styles/diagram-common.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        @font-face {
            font-family: 'e-ddb-icons';
            src: url(data:application/x-font-ttf;charset=utf-8;base64,) format('truetype');
            font-weight: normal;
            font-style: normal;
        }

        .e-ddb-icons {
            font-family: 'e-ddb-icons';
            speak: none;
            font-size: 16px;
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: normal;
            font-variant: normal;
            text-transform: none;
            line-height: 1;
            -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
            -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
        }

        .e-basic::before {
            content: "\e726";
        }

        .e-flow::before {
            content: "\e724";
        }

        .e-connector::before {
            content: "\e725";
        }

        .db-text {
            float: left;
            width: 20px;
            text-align: center;
            height: auto;
            margin-top: 4px;
            color: #8C8C8C;
        }

        .db-text-input {
            width: calc(100% - 25px);
            padding: 2px 2px 0px 0px;
        }

        .db-text-input input {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            border: none;
        }

        .disabledbutton {
            pointer-events: none;
            opacity: 0.4;
        }
    </style>
    <div style="width: 100%;">
        <div class="sb-mobile-palette-bar">
            <div id="palette-icon" style="float: right;" role="button" class="e-ddb-icons1 e-toggle-palette"></div>
        </div>
        <div id="palette-space" style="width:20%;float:left">
            <div id="symbolpalette" style="width:90%;"></div>
        </div>
        <div id="diagram-space" style="width:59%;float:left">
            <div id="diagram"></div>
        </div>
        <div id="properties" style="width:20%;float:right">
            <div class="property-panel-header">
                Properties
            </div>
            <div class="row db-prop-row">
                
                <div class="col-xs-5 db-col-right db-prop-text-style" style="padding-top: 14px">
                    <span class="db-prop-text-style db-spacing-text">Scroll Limit</span>
                </div>
                <div class="col-xs-7 db-col-left" style="padding-top: 10px;">
                    <div class="db-text-input">
                        <input type="text" id="scrollLimit">
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div id="scrollableDiv">
                <div class="property-panel-header">
                    Scrollable Area
                </div>
                <div class="row db-prop-row">
                    <div class="col-xs-6 db-col-left" style="padding-right: 5px;">
                        <div class="db-text-container">
                            <div style="width:40%;float:left;margin-top: 5px;">
                                <span>X</span>
                            </div>
                            <div style="width:60%;float:right">
                                <input type="text" id="x">
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-xs-6 db-col-right">
                        <div style="width:40%;float:left;margin-top: 5px;">
                            <span>Y</span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="width:60%;float:right">
                            <input type="text" id="y">
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="row db-prop-row" style="padding-top: 15px;">
                    <div class="col-xs-6 db-col-left" style="padding-right: 5px;">
                        <div class="db-text-container">
                            <div style="width:40%;float:left;margin-top: 5px;">
                                <span>Width</span>
                            </div>
                            <div style="width:60%;float:right">
                                <input type="text" id="width">
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-xs-6 db-col-right">
                        <div style="width:40%;float:left;margin-top: 5px;">
                            <span>Height</span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="width:60%;float:right">
                            <input type="text" id="height">
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div id="autoScrollDiv">
                <div class="property-panel-header">
                    AutoScroll border
                </div>
                <div class="row db-prop-row">
                    <div class="col-xs-6 db-col-left" style="padding-right: 5px;">
                        <div class="db-text-container">
                            <div style="width:40%;float:left;margin-top: 5px;">
                                <span>Left</span>
                            </div>
                            <div style="width:60%;float:right">
                                <input type="text" id="left">
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-xs-6 db-col-right">
                        <div style="width:40%;float:left;margin-top: 5px;">
                            <span>Top</span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="width:60%;float:right">
                            <input type="text" id="top">
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="row db-prop-row" style="padding-top: 15px;">
                    <div class="col-xs-6 db-col-left" style="padding-right: 5px;">
                        <div class="db-text-container">
                            <div style="width:40%;float:left;margin-top: 5px;">
                                <span>Right</span>
                            </div>
                            <div style="width:60%;float:right">
                                <input type="text" id="right">
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-xs-6 db-col-right">
                        <div style="width:40%;float:left;margin-top: 5px;">
                            <span>Bottom</span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="width:60%;float:right">
                            <input type="text" id="bottom">
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>

</div></body></html>
